: BrightBlade sees Perndabot nodd and she nodds back.:

OK

* She follows Perndabot out of the room and down into the hall, but making 
sure that she stuck behind him, because if any autoguns came down then he 
would be able to take the blasts for her.
It wasn't exactly mean, just the way she thought automatically.
All that matterd was her and herself, at the moment.
Her sensors had told her that it seemed as if Gangon had died, so that they 
would no longer need to detour to the brig to go and get him.
BrightBlade kept her gun armed, ready to shoot anyone who got in her way for 
any reason.
She was going to get this information back to base, or if not that then Hell 
Beast himself.*
